title: Screamtime: Zombie Fungus
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Imagine a fungus that could infiltrate your whole body, turn you into a puppet, and grow right out of the top of your head. Actually, you don't have to imagine it -- IT'S REAL. It's called Cordyceps, and fortunately, it only has this effect on insects... for now.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Screamtime: Zombie Fungus
